response.original_title: Z biegiem lat, z biegiem dni...
response.overview: The series is a story about the fate of two Krakow families, its action takes place in the years 1874-1914.  The series is an adaptation of works by writers from Young Poland and the interwar period, such as:  Michał Bałucki (Dom otwarty - episode 1)  Gabriela Zapolska (Sezonowa miłość  - episode 2; Moralność pani Dulskiej - episode 7; Śmierć Felicjana Dulskiego - episode 8)  Jan August Kisielewski (W sieci - episode 3; Karykatury - episode 4; Ostatnie spotkanie - episode 5)  Zygmunt Kawecki (Dramat Kaliny - episode 6)  Juliusz Kaden-Bandrowski (Łuk - episode 8)  The texts of these authors were put together by screenwriter Joanna Olczak-Ronikier. In this way, a work was created that shows the image of Polish society at the turn of the 19th and 20th centuries.
response.title: Z biegiem lat, z biegiem dni...
